description.displayText: We scheduled an interview with Morgan, (confirmed over messages) but she simply did not turn up! No cancellation reason provided or response to my text/call. Very disappointed indeed, especially after waiting in with my 16 month old son & wife to interview her. This shows a total lack of reliability/responsibility and professionalism. She simply did not have the common courtesy to inform us that she is no longer interested in the opportunity on offer. Very disappointed!
